verses.roman:
pañca-daśa-krośa-patha cali' gelā eka-dine
sandhyā-kāle rahilā eka gopera bāthāne

synonyms: pañca-daśa-krośa—about thirty miles; patha cali'-walking on the path; gelā—went; eka-dine—in one day; sandhyā-kāle—in the evening; rahilā—remained; eka gopera—of a milkman; bāthāne—in the cowshed.
translation: He walked about thirty miles in one day, and in the evening he took rest in the cowshed of a milkman.
